document.forum_title: Dancequestions Q&A - Recent questions and answers
document.topic_text: Welcome to Dancequestions Q&A, where you can ask questions and receive answers from other members of the community. BRENTWOOD, N 0 votes BRENTWOOD, N.H. (AP) - The former sports editor of a New Hampshire newspaper has been sentenced to less than a year in jail Porn Movies on child pornography possession charges.The Portsmouth Herald website ) reports Frank Coppola of Nottingham was sentenced Thursday in Brentwood to a year with eight months suspended after pleading guilty to two misdemeanors. Felony charges were dismissed through the plea agreement.The former sports editor of The Portsmouth Herald was indicted last June on charges he possessed images that show child sexual abuse.Coppola's attorney had asked for leniency, saying his client had no prior contact with law enforcement and has engaged in counseling for more than a year.Coppola apologized in court.___Information from: Portsmouth Herald, website editor sentenced in child Gay Porn possession caseIf you have any thoughts relating to where by and how to use Gay Porn , you can call us at our web-site.
